item.title: Great Minds Don't Think Alike
item.description: This session translates the science behind neurodiversity and provides leaders, HR professionals, and ERG teams, with pactical, research-based strategies to foster neuroinclusion in hiring, evaluation, and investigation practices. By exploring variations in thinking and communication styles, attendees will learn how to strengthen workplace dynamics, develop and retain talent, and create collaborative and productive teams where diverse ways of thinking drive innovation and success.
